website_summaries.verdict: If you love to change your look from understated to bold, this eyeliner is for you. Both liquid and gel tips go on smoothly and deliver long-lasting wear.
pros: We love this eyeliner's dual tips – liquid and gel – that make creating numerous looks a breeze
Contains minerals and Amazonian clay for smooth application and long wear
cons: Gel tip may break if you push too hard during application
Gel also doesn't wear quite as long as the liquid for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: By far my very favorite eyeliner ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner. I always had trouble with eyeliner/my contacts being irritated by different kinds: this is the only kind I can wear and have no issues. The liquid end is the magic. It puts you in control of your liner destiny. Buy this eye liner. You won’t be disappointed. This was probably my 30th I’ve been using these guys for years.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Dried out product
customer_reviews.text: Crayon part was dry and broke off within first month. Would not buy from this retailer again
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGal

customer_reviews.title: Pencil easily breaks
customer_reviews.text: I would have given the product a higher rating however 3 stars because the solid pencil part would break daily. The liquid eyeliner glides on nicely and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Works Just Like One I Bought in Store
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product at Ulta in the store for $28 plus tax. I loved it and wasn't I surprised when it was on sale for $13 bucks online! Too good to be true? Nope! Exact same quality as in the store. The retractable pencil is slightly flemsy on the first application but I haven't had any breakage issues since.
customer_reviews.author: JHeezy

customer_reviews.title: Pencil breaks, but liquid tip is gold. No irritations. Little to no smudging.
customer_reviews.text: My go-to eyeliner for the last 3 years! The pencil does break easily, and runs out much quicker than the liquid ink, (I use pencil for lower lid, and liquid for wings). But the liquid tip can just as easily be used for lower lid: it glides on so smoothly and precisely, and leaves little-to-no smudging throughout the day! It's also the only eyeliner I've used that doesn't cause irritations, especially with contacts in.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Product fell apart right away!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that the non liquid tip fell right out as soon as I took the cap off. It took me a good 15 minutes to find it. I was on my table, rolled down so i popped it back in and it fell right out again. A lit of money for a poorly put together product!!!! Will not buy again nor recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: Best liquid eyeliner ever. The brush is a little difficult to get used to but once you do, it's an awesome liner that is dark, precise, and stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Enchanted

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the BEST eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: So I am a huge believer in this eye liner. I have been buying it at Ulta for the past 5 years. I was more than pleasantly surprised to find it for 50% less then at the stores here on Amazon and I got it super fast with no issues at all. I feel so stupid for buying it anywhere else. This is the best eye liner you could ask for and this is the only manufacturer I use for makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Pleases the Persnickety
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this eyeliner! She is a Persnickety Girl when it comes to her eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: RENEE

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner did not even last one month. Nothing like when you buy it in store.
customer_reviews.text: Eyeliner did not even last one month. Nothing like when you buy it in store. I buy this eyeliner in Sephora all the time and it last me forever. just like the mascara I bought on Amazon that lasted me one month, so did this eyeliner. I’m very disappointed. I feel like I wasted my money on both products
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Looks great all day!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this eyeliner! It stays in place and looks great all day (unless, of course, I'm rubbing my eyes). My mom even saw it and asked for one because she couldn't believe how good it looked after wearing it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniffer Obando

customer_reviews.title: Good on the liquid side but the pencil side comes loose and falls out
customer_reviews.text: I love the liquid eyeliner side, but the crayon/pencil side always malfunctions, and runs. When you look down, that side gets on the top of your lids. Liquid side is great though, and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Never smears!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite so far! Doesn't smear all day long and always looks perfect . Will be buying over and over again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Better than kat von d
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many liquid eyeliners including Kat von D liner and this one tops all! The liquid is easy to apply and is very long lasting. The crayon is not so creamy and easy to apply but its so convenient for me because I like to wear it on the bottom. Even if you dont like the crayon you can buy it just for the liquid alone.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner and this is such a good price
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Item received was NOT what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one with gel pencil on one end and felt tip on the other. What I received was pencil. Not happy with it. It doesn’t glide on like the one that I ordered and it breaks easily. Not worth the money. I should have ordered from Ulta. I tried to save money and I ended up ordering from Ulta any way.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Webb

customer_reviews.title: overpriced dried out
customer_reviews.text: Dried up in two weeks. Loved it the first few days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the same JC Penney sells
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the eyeliner Penny's sells. Saved my 45 mile trip to get it. Delivery fast. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Kterry

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and BOTH were defective. The 1st has no visible point, as if it was empty. The 2nd the whole stick of liner would fall out the top when turned upside down and slide all the way in right side up. Impossible to use!
customer_reviews.author: B. Place

customer_reviews.title: All day wear
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my most favorite eyeliner! I have been searching for a product that doesnt smear and will stay on all day, and I finally found it! The fact that its double edged makes this pen even more clever. Amazon has the cheapest price around. LOVE this eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Lynn

customer_reviews.title: NOT A FULL SIZE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Product is not full size as it has previously been. I have ordered this product at least 5 times and every time it came full size. This time it is travel size 0.22 mL for the same price. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Not much pencil in there
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but breaks easily and very little pencil is actually in there, so it’s really a rip off and I’m amazed that Tarte does this to its customers.
customer_reviews.author: album notes

customer_reviews.title: Liquid liner side is better
customer_reviews.text: The liquid liner goes on really nicely, but the crayon broke very early on and isn’t my favorite. Also haven’t found the liner to last long, but I know my lids don’t hold makeup very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sigala

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware?
customer_reviews.text: I loved it BUT the pencil broke twice and now, after a month it is worthless. I plan on contacting the company because I really liked the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I love and hate this. I love it when it works. Both ends are amazing depending on the look you want. But my first one I ordered within a week the pencil end would not come out. Returned for replacement and the same thing happened. I am so bummed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Never buying any other eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite eyeliner!! I use the pencil side for work but it's so easy to use the other side if I decide to go out later and don't want to completely redo my makeup. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: cElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Hm
customer_reviews.text: Genuine, thought it was fake but I’m pretty sure it isn’t
customer_reviews.author: Shalalalame

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my other tartiest double eyeliner it was way smaller and didnt come in the box or anything it looks like it was a test eyeliner but wasnt used that I could tell
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST SHIPPING!!
customer_reviews.text: Seller shipping very quickly! Would purchase from them again! Item came exactly as described. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: B seals

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner pencil side doesn’t stay it runs way to quick for my liking but the liquid side is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hodle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutley love it!! runs smooth and stays on all day and i use both love them
customer_reviews.author: nelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand and product!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally smudge and waterproof! Great brand and stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: sharon e smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the full size product
customer_reviews.text: Not the full size product, by from Ultra or in store
customer_reviews.author: Summer H

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The eye liner applies very easily. If I make a mistake it removes without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: daine kerelis

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: One side completely missing with no cap such a shame! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go through actual tarte website
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in a box. Had a sticky tab around the eyeliner. I can’t even use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early
customer_reviews.text: Box was crushed and the liner looked dusty. I just tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I guess this would fall under the "you get what you paid for"
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this eyeliner for a while now and it's the best I've found. However, the reason for this 1 star review is because they significantly reduced the size of the item and raised the price. I'm not a fan of bait and switch tactics. Next time I'll be saving my money for a product that lasts longer than a week. If I wanted an eyeliner sample I would just reactivate my Ipsy account.
customer_reviews.author: aLove

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price for a quality product. The liquid liner stays put better than many other high end products I’ve tried. I love that I can order this on Amazon and have it to my doorstep for half the price of buying it in a store. Two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly B Ehler

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The felt tip is alright but not the best I’ve used. The crayon broke almost immediately... very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, goes on smooth, stays on smooth, looks crisp and perfect! Super black!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manning

customer_reviews.title: Product broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought thisb May 29th 2017 and the pencil end has broken off and it will not extend. The pencil side lasted all day but the liquid side did not last last eight hours on my
customer_reviews.author: Cz

customer_reviews.title: Pencil/crayon combo is SO cool.
customer_reviews.text: Ooh, I love this eyeliner! I'm trying to learn how to use liquid liner properly, and this is great for that because it has both a pencil and liquid. Of course, tarte always has high quality products too, so I'm really loving it.
customer_reviews.author: rain

customer_reviews.title: Best and most versatile on the market
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is now my favorite! The precision side is amazing too
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K.

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolute favorite eyeliner. Usually pay almost $30 at Ulta I was shocked to see the price I thought it was too good to be true but I got it today and was so happy that I ordered another!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Beghyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, liquid liner is unmatched with any other high end product. The pencil smears after wearing about 12 hours, but I still love them both
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing liquid eyeliner for a really long time and this is by far my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Meloney Parato

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great eyeliner, but the crayon end runs out VERY quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terri K.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product twice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyeliner but today it’s $32.00? That’s insane!
customer_reviews.author: JAHar

customer_reviews.title: Love the dual sides
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual sides. I use the pen for every day looks and the liquid liner for a more dramatic look. It's easy to blend and apply, as well as remove at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M. Hietsch

product_meta.title: Tarte Tarteist Double Take Eyeliner-black
product_meta.description: What it is: A dual-ended eyeliner with a waterproof liquid and a pencil liner, combined in one convenient tool. Highlighted Ingredients: - Amazonian Clay: Nature’s most perfect ingredient for better, longer, truer wear. - Mineral Pigments: Soothe and soften skin around the lash line. Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and triclosan. This product is also vegan and gluten-free. What Else You Need to Know: This long wear, two-in-one liquid and gel pencil eyeliner creates a wide range of eye looks. Amazonian clay-infused and self-sharpening, this gel pencil glides along the inner eye rim to perfectly define. The slick liquid eyeliner goes on glossy and dries to a semi-matte, opaque finish.
feature_bullets: Creates a wide range of eye looks with long wear 2-in-1 liquid & gel pencil eyeliner
Amazonian clay-infused gel pencil glides along the inner rim to define & tight line
Slick liquid eyeliner goes on glossy & dries instantly to a semi-matte, opaque finish
Soft-flex tip deposits even, saturated color perfect for an ultra-fine line or crisp cat eye
